ing: 1 large large tomato, cut in thin wedges
8 pitted kalamata olives, cut in half
Bacon, Onion and Mustard Salad Dressing (recipe below)
des: "Crisp cucumber, enoki mushrooms, and tomatoes are topped with a rich bacon, onion, and mustard salad dressing in this hearty salad."
ins: Combine salad, tomato, cucumber, croutons, mushrooms, walnuts and olives in large bowl. Toss with Bacon, Onion and Mustard Salad Dressing, to taste. Refrigerate any remaining dressing.
